title: Markos Kabob and More
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Middle Eastern food menu with some veg suitable choices like hummus, roasted eggplant dip, stuffed grape leaves, lentil soup, bean soup, tabouleh, artichoke heart salad, foule (warm beans topped with tahini sauce, cumin, tabouleh, olive oil), house curry, falafel (fried or baked), and bab touma (french fries in a wrap with lettuce, pickles, hot sauce). Nov 10, 2013 this location confirmed still open.
